Package: org.jlab.analysis

[Groovy] Class DecayProduct

    • org.jlab.analysis.DecayProduct 
    • @groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class DecayProduct
extends java.lang.Object

      Adds (essentially) time vertex, chi2pid, and status attributes to the standard Particle class minus some problematic methods for groovy as well as less used methods.

      Version:
      1.0
      Authors:
      Matthew McEneaney
